name: Zav Pro

extruders.select:
;---- Starting Start G-code Extruder 1 ----
;T0                             ;switch to extruder 1
;G92 E0                      ;reset extruder distance
;G1 F2000 E93           ;load filament
;G92 E0                      ;reset extruder distance
;M104 S{material_print_temperature}
;---- Ending Start G-code Extruder 1 ----
extruders.deselect:
;---- Starting End G-code Extruder 1 ----
;G92 E0                       ;reset extruder distance
;G1 F800 E-5               ;short retract
;G1 F2400 X5 Y5         ;move near prime tower
;G1 F2000 E-93           ;long retract for filament removal
;G92 E0                       ;reset extruder distance
;G90                            ;absolute coordinate
;---- Ending End G-code Extruder 1 ----

pre_gcode: G28 Z0                ;move Z to min endstops
G28 X0 Y0           ;move X/Y to min endstops
G1 Y40                ;move to start position Y
post_gcode: M140 S0                                        ;heated bed heater off (if you have it)
G1 E-4 F300                                  ;retract the filament a bit before lifting the nozzle to release some of the pressure
G1 Z+0.5 E-5 X-20 Y-20 F5000    ;move Z up a bit and retract filament even more
G28 X0 Y0                                     ;move X/Y to min endstops so the head is out of the way
M355 S0 P0                                  ;switch off case light
